description:
The heroine of the series.
[spoiler="Spoiler"]Tsukasa is the one Nasa following in a snow night and also the one who saved him. Nasa want to go out with her, but Tsukasa instead said she only go with someone she married. And then Nasa proposed to Tsukasa. She disappeared for a while before appear in front of the door of Nasa`s apartment to complete the promise between them. Tsukasa actually obsessed with TV, movies, anime, and games.[/spoiler]
name: Yuzaki Tsukasa
